title: What increases magnetic field inside solenoid

content.question:
Which of the following will increase the magnetic field on the axis of a long solenoid? 

Increasing the current in the solenoid 

Increasing the cross-sectional area of the solenoid 

Inserting an iron core into the solenoid

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
